医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示了卵母细胞长寿的新机制卵母细胞是几乎所有雌性哺乳动物在出生前发育的未成熟卵细胞。后代的繁殖取决于细胞的有限储备，能够存活多年而不会受到损害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Study-reveals-novel-mechanism-for-longevity-of-otherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Study-reveals-novel-mechanism-for-longevity-of-otherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ea75bbb-15ba-4bba-a6e8-6f15d0bf6829 Tue, 20 Feb 2024 13:18:15 -0500 Study reveals novel mechanism for longevity of oocytes
石墨烯生物传感器可准确评估肉类新鲜度动物肉的新鲜度是决定其质量和安全性的重要特性。凭借能够长时间保存食物的先进技术，肉类可以运往全球各地，并在动物死亡后很长时间内食用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Graphene-biosensor-offers-accurate-assessment-of-meat-freshness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Graphene-biosensor-offers-accurate-assessment-of-meat-freshness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80052e19-aad8-46b1-8f8a-7aee19930e23 Tue, 20 Feb 2024 13:10:37 -0500 Graphene biosensor offers accurate assessment of meat freshness
研究评估拉丁美洲的结直肠癌筛查计划除美国和加拿大外，整个西半球对结直肠癌筛查策略知之甚少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Study-evaluates-colorectal-cancer-screening-programs-in-Latin-America.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Study-evaluates-colorectal-cancer-screening-programs-in-Latin-America.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2bafd020-f724-447d-ac42-e81b353114a7 Tue, 20 Feb 2024 13:06:34 -0500 Study evaluates colorectal cancer screening programs in Latin America
超加工食品：对公共健康的威胁日益严重从碳酸饮料到谷物食品，从包装零食到加工肉类，超加工食品都富含添加剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Ultra-processed-foods-A-forming-threat-to-public-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Ultra-processed-foods-A-forming-threat-to-public-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0b3875bc-26eb-427f-a044-dd472a834855 Tue, 20 Feb 2024 13:02:32 -0500 Ultra-processed foods: A growing threat to public health
研究表明 PCSK9 抑制剂在高危患者中的利用率较低发表在《循环：家庭心脏基金会的心血管质量和结果》上的一项新研究 -；一个以患者为中心的研究和倡导非营利组织，致力于改善受遗传性脂质疾病和低密度脂蛋白胆固醇影响的家庭的生活；研究表明，在高危患者中，前蛋白转化酶枯草杆菌蛋白酶/kexin 9 型抑制剂 (PCSK9i) 用于降低低密度脂蛋白胆固醇 (LDL-C) 的利用率仍然较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Study-reveals-low-utilization-of-PCSK9-inhibitors-in-high-risk-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Study-reveals-low-utilization-of-PCSK9-inhibitors-in-high-risk-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d4b1a38-6b54-4937-aa91-86f076c9e895 Tue, 20 Feb 2024 12:55:59 -0500 Study reveals low utilization of PCSK9 inhibitors in high-risk patients
确定与原发性开角型青光眼相关的新遗传位置一项使用多祖先生物库的国际遗传学研究发现了与原发性开角型青光眼（POAG）相关的新遗传位置，POAG是最常见的青光眼类型，也是全球不可逆性失明的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Novel-genic-locations- Associated-with-primary-open-angle-glaucoma-identified.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Novel-genic-locations-linked-with-primary-open-angle-glaucoma-identified.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e0248d0d-a9f0-4902-a1a6-7f7007b7a29c Tue, 20 Feb 2024 12:33:03 -0500 Novel genetic locations associated with primary open-angle glaucoma identified
研究表明基于应用程序的儿童癌症疼痛管理反应良好劳伦斯·布隆伯格护理学院助理教授兼病童医院 (SickKids) 科学家 Lindsay Jibb 最近领导的一项研究发现，患有癌症的幼儿的父母以及儿科癌症临床医生都赞成基于应用程序的解决方案Jibb 和她的团队正在创建这个项目，帮助父母在家控制孩子的癌症疼痛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Study-shows-favorable-response-to-app-based-cancer-pain-management-for-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Study-shows-favorable-response-to-app-based-cancer-pain-management-for-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ba862b2-2f99-488d-b08b-feaa2e61d73b Tue, 20 Feb 2024 12:27:19 -0500 Study shows favorable response to app-based cancer pain management for children
长女的青春期提前与母亲的产前压力有关加州大学洛杉矶分校领导的研究小组发现，长女的肾上腺青春期早期迹象与其母亲经历的高水平产前压力之间存在相关性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Early-puberty-in-first-born-daughters-linked-to-prenatal-stress-in-their-mothers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Early-puberty-in-first-born-daughters-linked-to-prenatal-stress-in-their-mothers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5905e929-8711-4894-b98d-47e58cbfc1fe Tue, 20 Feb 2024 12:19:00 -0500 Early puberty in first-born daughters linked to prenatal stress in their mothers
超高空间分辨率 PCD-CT 改善冠状动脉疾病的评估根据今天发表在放射学会杂志《放射学》上的一项新研究，超高空间分辨率光子计数探测器 CT 改善了对冠状动脉疾病 (CAD) 的评估，允许将 54% 的患者重新分类为较低的疾病类别北美的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Ultrahigh-spatial-resolution-PCD-CT-improves-assessment-of-coronary-artery-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Ultrahigh-spatial-resolution-PCD-CT-improves-assessment-of-coronary-artery-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69056af7-565b-4a81-b857-b572cc4415c9 Tue, 20 Feb 2024 12:15:00 -0500 Ultrahigh-spatial-resolution PCD-CT improves assessment of coronary artery disease
从 40 岁开始每年进行乳腺癌筛查可以最大程度地降低死亡率根据今天发表在北美放射学会杂志《放射学》上的一项新研究，从 40 岁开始并持续到至少 79 岁的年度乳腺癌筛查可以最大程度地降低死亡率，同时风险最小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Annual-breast-cancer-screening-beginning-at-age-40-results-in-highest-mortality-reduction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Annual-breast-cancer-screening-beginning-at-age-40-results-in-highest-mortality-reduction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61f95c14-8ce9-4224-8388-c3c5710ab716 Tue, 20 Feb 2024 12:10:59 -0500 Annual breast cancer screening beginning at age 40 results in highest mortality reduction
